===Interjection===
{{zh-interj}}

# [[sorry]]; [[excuse me]]
#* {{zh-x|對不起！真的 對不起！對於 我 來說，我 的 態度 非常 明確，我 絕不 袒護 我 的 孩子！|'''I am sorry'''. '''I am really sorry'''. Personally my attitude (towards this incident) is very clear: I will never give unprincipled protection to my child.|ref='''2010:''' {{lang|zh|[http://news.163.com/10/1023/07/6JLO1T1R00014AED.html “对不起！真的对不起！”]}}}}

====Usage notes====
* {{qualifier|Min Nan}} {{lang|zh|對不起}} is rarely used as an interjection meaning "I'm sorry". Use {{zh-l|歹勢|tr=phái-sè}} or {{zh-l|失禮|tr=sit-lé}} instead.

===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}
